    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Napóleon csatát irányít</string>
            <string language="en">Napolen controls the battle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Napolen steuert die Schlacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Napolen contrôle la bataille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Napolen controla a batalha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Napolen gestisce la battaglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Napolen ελέγχει τη μάχη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Napolen controla la batalla</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Napóleon egy dombról szemléli a csata menetét</string>
            <string language="en">Napoleon watches the outcome of the battle from the  hill.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">napóleoni háborúk,  hadtörténet,  hadvezetés,  </string>
            <string language="en">Napoleon's wars, military history, conduct of war</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Napoleon überwacht das Resultat der Schlacht vom
Hügel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Napoleon observe les résultats de la bataille de 
la colline.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Napoleon presta atenção ao resultado da batalha
do monte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Napoleon guarda il risultato della battaglia dalla
collina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Napoleon προσέχει την έκβαση της μάχης από το 
λόφο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Napoleon mira el resultado de la batalla de la 
colina.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kriege Napoleons, militärische Geschichte, Führung des 
Krieges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les guerres de Napoleon, histoire militaire, conduite de guerre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerras de Napoleon, history militar, conduta da guerra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guerre del Napoleon, storia militare, comportamento della 
guerra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόλεμοι Napoleon, στρατιωτική ιστορία, συμπεριφορά του 
πολέμου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guerras de Napoleon, historia militar, conducta de la guerra</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
